hero_text: With regular check-ups, tartar cleaning, follow-up and hygiene sessions, you stay happy and your teeth stay healthy.
about_text:
Oral and dental health is not only an aesthetic issue; it is an inseparable part of quality of life, general health and self-confidence.
     At Atikdent, we provide dentistry practices that are tailored to the needs of each individual, based on scientific foundations and focused on long-term results.

feature_smile_desc: We always offer you a warm and welcoming environment.
feature_tech_desc: We work with state-of-the-art digital dentistry equipment.
feature_care_desc: We shape your treatment plan entirely with your feedback.
services_sub: In the treatment process, we act with the awareness that we are not only treating a tooth, but touching a person’s life. You can review the treatment headings below that may be suitable for you and access detailed information about each of them on our subpages.
service_general_desc: Healthy teeth with regular check-ups and hygiene sessions.
service_cosmetic_desc: High-quality materials for a natural appearance.
service_implant_desc: Thanks to titanium screws (implants) placed into the jawbone, fixed dental prostheses can be applied to replace missing teeth. It is the closest solution to natural teeth in terms of aesthetics and function. For patients with suitable bone structure, it is a long-lasting treatment option.
service_whitening_desc: A procedure in which discolored teeth are lightened by several shades using special gels and light systems. In-clinic whitening provides fast and safe results. It is ideal for those who want to achieve an aesthetic smile in a short time.
service_zirconium_desc: Aesthetic dental crowns made of white zirconium-based materials. They are metal-free and, thanks to their light transmittance, have a natural tooth-like appearance. They are especially preferred for anterior (front) teeth aesthetics.
service_veneer_desc: Aesthetic procedures made with a thin layer of composite material applied to the tooth surface. They are used to change the shape and color of the teeth quickly. Tooth reduction is kept at a minimum and the procedure is often completed in a single session.
service_ortho_desc: The classic bracket system that corrects crowded teeth and bite problems. It can be applied with metal or aesthetic (clear) brackets. It is suitable for both children and adults.
service_clearalign_desc: An aesthetic orthodontic method that aligns the teeth with custom-made clear aligners without the use of braces. Since the aligners are removable, they are comfortable to use. They are ideal for adults who are concerned about appearance.
service_pedo_desc: Covers the treatment of primary and permanent teeth of children between 0–13 years of age. Dental caries, preventive applications (fissure sealant, fluoride), trauma treatments, and extraction–prosthesis procedures specific to children are performed. A gentle, reassuring approach tailored to children is of great importance.
service_root_desc: Applied when the nerve tissue inside the tooth becomes inflamed due to advanced decay or trauma. The root of the tooth is cleaned and shaped, then filled with special filling materials. It allows the tooth to remain in the mouth in a functional way without extraction.
service_scaling_desc: Removal of tartar (calculus) and plaque accumulated on the teeth using ultrasonic devices. It protects gum health, reduces bad breath and lowers the risk of tooth loss. It is generally recommended at regular intervals every 6 months.
service_perio_desc: Treatment of gum inflammation (gingivitis) and advanced gum diseases (periodontitis). The aim is to prevent gum bleeding, swelling, recession and tooth mobility. When necessary, surgical procedures are used to support the gums and surrounding tissues.
service_smiledesign_desc: An aesthetic smile design tailored to the person’s facial shape, teeth and gum structure. It can combine applications such as zirconium crowns, laminate veneers, whitening and gum aesthetics. In addition to aesthetics, chewing function and long-term comfort are also important.
service_prosthesis_desc: Artificial teeth used to replace missing teeth, either fixed or removable. There are total (full) dentures, partial dentures and implant-supported prosthesis options. They aim to restore both aesthetic appearance and chewing functions.
service_surgery_desc: Surgical removal of broken, impacted or difficult-to-extract teeth. It is frequently applied especially for fully or partially impacted wisdom teeth. It is performed under local anesthesia in a controlled and painless way.
